## Loading libraries

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```

Loading data

```{r}
file_path <- "/net/pupil1/home/people/s243057/projects/group_23_project/data/02_dat_clean.csv"
df <- read.csv(file_path)
```

```{r}
num <- 1:569
ggplot(df,
       aes(x = num,
           y = radius_mean,
           color = diagnosis)) +
  geom_point()
```

Adding columns

```{r}
df1 <- df |>
  mutate(radius_gravity = case_when(
    radius_mean < 10 ~ "Low",
    radius_mean >= 10 & radius_mean < 20 ~ "Medium",
    radius_mean >= 20 ~ "High"),
    radius_gravity = factor(radius_gravity, levels = c("Low", "Medium", "High")))

```

```{r}
df2 <- df1 |> 
  mutate(diagnosis_binary = if_else(diagnosis == "M", 1, 0))
```
